sn55.19:4.3: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
sn55.19:4.6: Atha kho sambahulā tāvatiṃsakāyikā devatāyo yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn55.19:4.7: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
sn55.19:4.8: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā devatāyo āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
sn55.19:5.1: “Sādhu kho, āvuso, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṃ hoti—
sn55.19:5.4: Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanahetu kho, āvuso, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā.
sn55.19:5.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.19:5.9: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu kho, āvuso, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā”ti.
sn55.19:6.1: “Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṃ hoti—
sn55.19:6.4: Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanahetu kho, mārisa moggallāna, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā.
sn55.19:6.5: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, dhamme … pe …
sn55.19:6.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.19:6.9: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu kho, mārisa moggallāna, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā”ti.
